targets.query: SELECT mean("read_latency_98thPercentile") FROM "jolokia" WHERE "role" =~ /$Role$/ AND "region" =~ /$Region$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("read_latency_95thPercentile") FROM "jolokia" WHERE "role" =~ /$Role$/ AND "region" =~ /$Region$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("read_latency_75thPercentile") FROM "jolokia" WHERE "role" =~ /$Role$/ AND "region" =~ /$Region$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("storage_used_Count") FROM "jolokia" WHERE "role" =~ /$Role$/ AND "region" =~ /$Region$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("storage_used_Count") FROM "jolokia" WHERE "role" =~ /$Role$/ AND "region" =~ /$Region$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT min("storage_used_Count") FROM "jolokia" WHERE "role" =~ /$Role$/ AND "region" =~ /$Region$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("write_latency_98thPercentile") FROM "jolokia" WHERE "role" =~ /$Role$/ AND "region" =~ /$Region$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("write_latency_95thPercentile") FROM "jolokia" WHERE "role" =~ /$Role$/ AND "region" =~ /$Region$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("read_latency_75thPercentile") FROM "jolokia" WHERE "role" =~ /$Role$/ AND "region" =~ /$Region$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("load15") FROM "system" WHERE "role" =~ /$Role$/ AND "region" =~ /$Region$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("load5") FROM "system" WHERE "role" =~ /$Role$/ AND "region" =~ /$Region$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("load1") FROM "system" WHERE "role" =~ /$Role$/ AND "region" =~ /$Region$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("read_latency_OneMinuteRate") FROM "jolokia" WHERE "role" =~ /$Role$/ AND "region" =~ /$Region$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("write_latency_OneMinuteRate") FROM "jolokia" WHERE "role" =~ /$Role$/ AND "region" =~ /$Region$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("heap_memory_usage") FROM "jolokia" WHERE "role" =~ /$Role$/ AND "region" =~ /$Region$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "hostname"
SELECT last("nonheap_memory_usage") FROM "jolokia" WHERE "role" =~ /$Role$/ AND "region" =~ /$Region$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "hostname"

SELECT min("clients_native_Value") FROM "jolokia" WHERE "role" =~ /$Role$/ AND "region" =~ /$Region$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT max("clients_thrift_Value") FROM "jolokia" WHERE "role" =~ /$Role$/ AND "region" =~ /$Region$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("clients_thrift_Value") FROM "jolokia" WHERE "role" =~ /$Role$/ AND "region" =~ /$Region$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT min("clients_thrift_Value") FROM "jolokia" WHERE "role" =~ /$Role$/ AND "region" =~ /$Region$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

list.name: Role
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "role" WHERE role =~ /cassandra-/

list.name: Region
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "region" WHERE role =~ /cassandra-/
